name: PenguinScape
description:
Global warming is melting away Mr. Penguin's home, and now he is separated from his family.

Help Mr. Penguin back to his family! Watch out for dangers like oil spills and melting ice, while picking up as much litter and eating as much as you can along the way.

PenguinScape is a 2D automatic side-scrolling platformer created for the Climate Jam 2018.

Here is a short gameplay video: (Note the frame rate slow down was from the capturing software, in game frame rate is much  better):
